Class Edge

java.lang.Object
Edge
public class Edge extends Object
Class Edge which indicates the distance between two Nodes.
An Edge has a weight, a Node from where it originates and the Nodes where it ends.
In other terms an Edge is a Path between two nodes.
Author:
A. La Fauci De Leo Adapted from Mandliya(2017)

      endNode - the Node where the edge ends
      weight - the weight between the two nodes
